items.content_html: ChatApplication is a lightweight web-based chat application designed for real-time communication. With features like user authentication, customizable profiles, and multiple chat rooms, users can easily connect and interact with others on various topics. Built with modern technologies like React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, ChatApplication
